    • 飠 [ shí ] food; to eat
    • 胡 [ hú ] recklessly, foolishly; wildly
humanum_full_description_en:
From " food " to " hu " sound. The original meaning is thick porridge. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Fo, 饘 Ye." Guo Pu's note: "Fo, Mi Ye."

" Paste " as a verb means to satisfy one's hunger with porridge and barely make ends meet. "Shuowen": "Paste, send food. Congshi, Husheng." And "Dialect": "Send food is paste." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. The Eleventh Year of Yin Gong: "A few people have younger brothers, so they can't be in harmony, so they can live in all directions." "Historical Records. Biography of Fan Sui and Cai Ze: "Wu Zixu came out of Zhaoguan, walking at night and day and night. As for Lingshui, there is no way to make ends meet. In the state of Wu, Helu is a master." He also wrote " Fuzz ".

" Paste " also means adhesion. For example, Su Shunqin of the Northern Song Dynasty "According to the book of Ye Daoqing, the envoy of the Ministry of Science and Technology": "If you examine art and literature, you will copy the name and paste the name. The study of Hengwen will be extravagant in order to practice the truth." The name of the candidate.

" Fuzzy " also means to be deceived and cover up. For example, Chapter 23 of "The Scholars": "When the Wanjia came out, he couldn't help kneeling on his own and made a few tricks. At that time, he exchanged ten thousand taels of silver before he went out without breaking the picture."
humanum_short_description_en: From " food " to " hu " sound. The original meaning is thick porridge.
humanum_full_description:
從「食」，「胡」聲。本義是稠粥。《爾雅．釋言》：「餬，饘也。」郭璞注：「餬，糜也。」

　　「餬」作動詞表示以粥充飢，勉強維持生活。《說文》：「餬，寄食也。从食，胡聲。」又《方言》：「寄食為餬。」如《左傳．隱公十一年》：「寡人有弟，不能和協，而使餬其口於四方。」《史記．范睢蔡澤列傳》：「伍子胥橐載而出昭關，夜行晝伏，至於陵水，無以餬其口，䣛行蒲伏，稽首肉袒，鼓腹吹篪，乞食於吳市，卒興吳國，闔閭為伯。」又寫作「糊」。

　　「餬」也表示黏合。如北宋蘇舜欽〈應制科上省使葉道卿書〉：「考藝文則謄書餬名，衡文之學，靡以行實相雄長。」「餬名」指在姓名上黏紙，遮去考生的姓名。

　　「餬」還表示蒙騙、遮掩。如《儒林外史》第23回：「萬家走了出來，就由不的自己跪着，作了幾個揖，當時兌了一萬兩銀子出來，纔餬的去了，不曾破相。」

從「 食 」，「 胡 」聲。本義是稠粥。《爾雅．釋言》：「餬，饘也。」郭璞注：「餬，糜也。」 「 餬 」作動詞表示以粥充飢，勉強維持生活。《說文》：「餬，寄食也。从食，胡聲。」又《方言》：「寄食為餬。」如《左傳．隱公十一年》：「寡人有弟，不能和協，而使餬其口於四方。」《史記．范睢蔡澤列傳》：「伍子胥橐載而出昭關，夜行晝伏，至於陵水，無以餬其口，䣛行蒲伏，稽首肉袒，鼓腹吹篪，乞食於吳市，卒興吳國，闔閭為伯。」又寫作「 糊 」。 「 餬 」也表示黏合。如北宋蘇舜欽〈應制科上省使葉道卿書〉：「考藝文則謄書餬名，衡文之學，靡以行實相雄長。」「餬名」指在姓名上黏紙，遮去考生的姓名。 「 餬 」還表示蒙騙、遮掩。如《儒林外史》第23回：「萬家走了出來，就由不的自己跪着，作了幾個揖，當時兌了一萬兩銀子出來，纔餬的去了，不曾破相。」

餬字的基本解释

餬
hú
同“糊2”②。

餬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hú］
［《廣韻》户吴切，平模，匣。］
(1)稠粥。
(2)指粉加水调和煮成的胶状物。
(3)谓以粥、糊充实口腹。
(4)涂抹；粘合。参见“餬名”。
(5)蒙骗；遮掩。

餬字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　餬； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1422第27
【唐韻】戸吳切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】洪孤切，?音胡。【爾雅·釋言】餬，饘也。【註】糜也。【疏】餬饘，鬻糜相類之物。稠者曰糜，淖者曰鬻，餬饘是其別名。【左傳·昭七年】饘於是，鬻於是，以餬余口。　又【玉篇】寄食也。【左傳·隱十一年】餬其口於四方。【註】餬，鬻也。

餬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
餬字的起名意思

暂无。

paste
Basic explanation of words
paste
hú
Same as "Paste 2"②.
paste
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hú］
["Guangyun" Hu Wuqie, flat mold, box. ]
(1) Thick porridge.
(2) Refers to the jelly made by adding water and mixing powder.
(3) It is said to enrich the appetite with porridge and paste.
(4) Painting; bonding. See "Fuzzy Name".
(5) To be deceived; to cover up.
paste
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Food Character Department】　倀; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1422 Page 27
[Tang Yun] Jian Wu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Hong Gu Qi,? Yin Hu. [Erya·Interpretation] Paste, Yan Ye. [Note] Mi also. 【Sparse】Paste glutinous rice, glutinous rice-like things. The thick one is called Mi, the Nao one is called Fu, and the paste is another name. [Zuo Zhuan·Seventh Year of Zhao] Yu Yu, Yu Yu, to make ends meet.　[Jade articles] Also send food. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleven Years] Living in the Quartet. [Note] Paste, Fu also.
paste
